com.percolate.caffeine

Class PhoneUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.percolate.caffeine.PhoneUtils

  • public class PhoneUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Common phone utility methods

    Common uses:

    PhoneUtils.isRotationEnabled(this);
    PhoneUtils.isNetworkAvailable(this);
    PhoneUtils.isConnectedWifi(this);
    PhoneUtils.isConnectedMobile(this);

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhoneUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isConnectedMobile(android.content.Context context)
      Check if there is any connectivity to a mobile network Can be used in combination with isConnectedWifi(android.content.Context) to provide different features if the device is on a wifi network or a cell network.
      static boolean isConnectedWifi(android.content.Context context)
      Check if there is any connectivity to a Wifi network.
      static boolean isNetworkAvailable(android.content.Context context)
      Checks to see if the device is connected to a network (cell, wifi, etc).
      static boolean isRotationEnabled(android.content.Context context)
      Checks to see if the user has rotation enabled/disabled in their phone settings.

    • Method Detail

      • isRotationEnabled

        public static boolean isRotationEnabled(android.content.Context context)
        Checks to see if the user has rotation enabled/disabled in their phone settings.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        Returns:
        true if rotation is enabled, otherwise false.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        public static boolean isNetworkAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        Checks to see if the device is connected to a network (cell, wifi, etc).
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        Returns:
        true if a network connection is available, otherwise false.

      • isConnectedWifi

        public static boolean isConnectedWifi(android.content.Context context)
        Check if there is any connectivity to a Wifi network. Can be used in combination with isConnectedMobile(android.content.Context) to provide different features if the device is on a wifi network or a cell network.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        Returns:
        true if a wifi connection is available, otherwise false.

      • isConnectedMobile

        public static boolean isConnectedMobile(android.content.Context context)
        Check if there is any connectivity to a mobile network Can be used in combination with isConnectedWifi(android.content.Context) to provide different features if the device is on a wifi network or a cell network.
        Parameters:
        context - The current Context or Activity that this method is called from
        Returns:
        true if a mobile connection is available, otherwise false.
